meta.title: NCS NTI LEARNING COVID-19 WEEKEND UPDATE - Nelson County Schools

meta.content: NCS NTI LEARNING COVID-19 WEEKEND UPDATE

Happy Friday NC Families, Click here bit.ly/ncsntiupdate417 to learn more about a potential timeline for end of the year decision making, Wellness Wednesdays, and how you can connect with us next week at thecommunitybrewlive.com Please visit NCSNTIDAYS.COM for ongoing updates across the district. We HEART NC!
